processing_structure.text: Overall: Input one integer and output sum of its divisors
3. Loop from 1 to the input value
3-1. Check if the number divides evenly (n % i == 0)
3-2. If divisible, add it to the sum

advice.text: Run the program with a few small inputs to see if outputs match what you expect.
Trace variable values while the loop runs by printing key values to watch the calculation steps.
Add printf statements: show the input before the loop, print i and updated sum inside the if, and print the final sum; test with n=6 and n=1 and compare to manual results.
